ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable heroku.

PMPERMIT_PIC.description: put here any telegraph media link for pmpermit custom pic.

ALIVE_NAME.description: Fill your Full name or Username like @GŒ≤Œµ‚Ç∑hMod

ALIVE_IMAGE.description: put here any telegraph media link use .alive to show.

APP_ID.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Putting Others Value may result In Account Ban.

API_HASH.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Putting Others Value may result In Account Ban.

BOT_NICK_NAME.description: Coustom Userbot name... Or remove ¬©Modified ‚òö  Tag‚Ñ¢

PLUGIN_CHANNEL.description: Channel Where You Save Your Plugins

SUDO_USERS.description: Enter A User Id Which You Would Like to Use To Control Sudo. Don't Give Your Own ID Or ID Of Users You Don't Trust.

PRIVATE_GROUP_ID.description: A Group ID Where You Want Logging Feature

GITHUB_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Your Github Access Token for GitHub Commit Plugin. Google 'Github access token' to find more About It.

NO_OF_BUTTONS_DISPLAY_IN_CMD.description: Set The Amount Of Buttons Displayed In Help Command

NO_OF_COLUMS_DISPLAY_IN_CMD.description: Set The Amount Of Rows You Want To Displayed In Help Command

EMOJI_TO_DISPLAY_IN_HELP.description: Set The emojies üéñYou Want to Add In Help Command!!

REM_BG_API_KEY.description: Required for Removing image background functionality. Get from https://www.remove.bg/

OCR_SPACE_API_KEY.description: Register an account on ocr.space to get this value(API key)....

LYDIA_API_KEY.description: Needed for Lydia AI. Follow https://telegra.ph/Lydia-09-05 to get your API.  Coffeehouse chatbot api key, get one from https://coffeehouse.intellivoid.info/

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Go to https://dashboard.heroku.com/account, scroll down and press Reveal API.Required for updater to work.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: The Value of App Name you filled in right on top. Required for updater to work.

TRASH_DOWNLOAD_DIRECTORY.description: Where downloaded useless  files will go.

TG_BOT_TOKEN.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at http://telegram.dog/BotFather and get the token of your bot. And Don't Forget To Turn on inline Mode on bot settings. Get it.

TG_BOT_USER_NAME.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at http://telegram.dog/BotFather and get the username of your bot

DOWNLOAD_PFP_URL_CLOCK.description: Needed for autopic module. A url that is a preview link of your Profile Pic

TZ.description: Required for Correct Time for autopic get from http://www.timezoneconverter.com/cgi-bin/findzone.tzc
